homepage.headerDescription: The first mobile app for measuring and treating bruxism
homepage.titleDescription: BruxTest is a worldwide, research-based smartphone app designed to analyze bruxism and its possible consequences, and to take appropriate action on the condition.
homepage.aboutUsDescription: Our system helps clinicians diagnose and monitor bruxism, temporomandibular disorders and other dental problems outside the office.
homepage.aboutUsDescriptionMore: The system consists of a smartphone application and a small wireless electromyographic (EMG)device that the patient wears on the lower jaw. The system was created thanks to the work of an international research team.
homepage.measuringDeviceDescriptionMore: Our EMG machine is designed to measure tooth friction while providing a protective barrier between the teeth. These appliances wear as intended with use and can be easily replaced to prevent damage to the dentition.
homepage.measuringDeviceDetail: The EMG device has been designed especially for people suffering from bruxism who do not show any symptoms of temporomandibular joint disorders. Single-layer braces fit comfortably against any mouth size and, when positioned, help reduce muscle tension around your mouth while you sleep. EMG is easy to shape and recommended for use overnight as well as during the day as long as the patient is rubbing their teeth during this time.
